com.ibm.cuda.CudaModule

Packages that use CudaModule
Package
Description
com.ibm.cuda
This package enables access to CUDA-capable devices from Java.

  • Uses of CudaModule in com.ibm.cuda

    Method
    Description
    CudaModule
    CudaModule.Cache.get(CudaDevice device, Object key)
    Retrieves an existing module for the specified device and key.
    CudaModule
    CudaModule.Cache.put(CudaDevice device, Object key, CudaModule module)
    Stores a module in this cache, associating it with the given device and key.
